sideNavBar.deleteTagConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? This will remove the tag from all notes.

encryptedContent.securityTip: This content is encrypted. Please enter the correct password to view it.

floatingAI.startConversation: Start a conversation with the AI assistant

mainLayout.selectOrCreateNoteHint: Select a notebook on the left, then select a note from the list to edit, or create a new note to start jotting down your ideas.
mainLayout.confirmDeleteNotebookMessage:
Are you sure you want to delete the notebook {name}?
This action is irreversible and will delete all its sub-notebooks and notes.
mainLayout.errorCreateUncategorized: Failed to create 'Uncategorized' notebook, please try again.
mainLayout.errorCreateNote: Failed to create new note, please try again later.
mainLayout.confirmDeleteNote: Are you sure you want to delete this note?

markdownDropPreview.dropHint: Press ESC or click the close button to dismiss this overlay
markdownDropPreview.fileTypeHintMessage:
Detected files: {files}

Please drag and drop Markdown files (supports .md, .markdown, .mdown, .mkd, etc.)

noteEditor.encryptedNoteDescription: This note is password protected. Please enter the correct password to view the content.
noteEditor.encryptedPlaceholder: [This note is encrypted, please unlock to view]
noteEditor.confirmImageUpload: Do you want to upload the image and insert it into the note?
noteEditor.saveNoteForAudio: Please save the note before recording audio
noteEditor.saveNoteForPlayer: Please save the note before opening the player

noteList.loadContentError: Error: Failed to load note content.
noteList.encryptedPreview: This note is encrypted, unlock with password

passwordDialog.strengthHint: Tip: You can use any length of password, but a strong password is recommended for better security.

updateManager.manualUpdateRequiredMessage: Automatic update failed due to signature verification failure. This may be caused by network issues or configuration errors. Would you like to go to the release page to manually download the latest version?

conflictResolutionDialog.title: Sync Conflict Resolution
conflictResolutionDialog.noConflictsMessage: All data has been successfully synchronized
conflictResolutionDialog.conflictInstruction: Please choose how to handle these conflicts

syncHistoryDialog.title: Sync History
syncHistoryDialog.noHistoryMessage: No sync operations or conflict resolutions have been recorded yet

backgroundImport.success: Background import complete: Imported {notes} notes, created {notebooks} notebooks.

updateDialog.restartPromptMessage: Update installed! Relaunch the application now?

local.label: Local Mode
local.description: All data is stored locally on this device. No network connection required.

remote.label: Remote Mode
remote.description: Directly connects to a remote database. Requires a constant network connection.

embedded_replica.label: Embedded Replica
embedded_replica.description: Recommended. Local-first with background sync to a remote database. Best of both worlds.

remoteConfig.urlHelp: Connection URL for your remote Turso database
remoteConfig.tokenPlaceholderLocal: Can be empty for local dev

prompts.switchSuccess: {result}\n\nNotebooks and notes have been automatically refreshed.
prompts.needRemoteConfigDesc:
Please configure your remote database first:

1. Enter the remote database URL (e.g., libsql://your-db.turso.io or http://127.0.0.1:8888)
2. Enter the auth token (optional for local dev)
3. Click 'Test & Save Config'
4. Then try switching to embedded replica mode.
prompts.switchFailedWAL:
Switch failed, possibly due to inconsistent database file state.

Would you like to automatically clean up the database files and retry?

This operation is safe and usually resolves such issues.
prompts.syncNotSupported: Sync is not supported in the current database mode.
prompts.syncSuccess: {result}\n\nNotebooks and notes have been automatically refreshed.
prompts.cleanupConfirmMessage:
Are you sure you want to clean up local database files?

This will delete temporary files like WAL and SHM, which can resolve WAL index errors during database switching.

This operation is safe and will not delete data in your main database file.
prompts.optimizeWALConfirmMessage:
Are you sure you want to optimize the WAL file?

Optimizing the WAL file can improve database performance, but it may take some time.

This operation is safe and will not delete data in your main database file.
prompts.testSuccess: Remote database connection test successful, configuration saved!
prompts.testFailed: Remote database connection test failed, please check URL and token!
prompts.restoreConfirmMessage: Restoring the database will overwrite all current data. This action is irreversible! Are you sure you want to continue?

aboutSettings.title: About
aboutSettings.description: A simple note-taking application to help you collect and organize useful code snippets, documents, and tips.

appSettings.title: App Settings
appSettings.autoStartDescription: If enabled, the application will start automatically when you log in.

contentCapture.title: Content Capture Settings
contentCapture.enableMonitoringDescription: When enabled, the system will automatically monitor and capture clipboard changes. When disabled, content can only be added manually via shortcuts.
contentCapture.enableAppWhitelistDescription: When enabled, clipboard content from whitelisted applications will not be added to the clipboard area.
contentCapture.captureImagesDescription: When enabled, the clipboard area will also capture images from the clipboard.
contentCapture.captureSourceInfoDescription: When enabled, the source application or window name of the clipboard content will be recorded.

whitelist.title: App Whitelist Management
whitelist.tipWindows: Windows: Use process name (e.g., chrome.exe, notepad.exe)
whitelist.tipMacos: macOS: Use application name (e.g., Google Chrome, TextEdit)
whitelist.tipLinux: Linux: Use process name (e.g., chrome, gedit)
whitelist.disabledInfo: Please enable the app whitelist feature first to manage the whitelist.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention Settings
dataRetention.retentionTimeDescription: Set the time for automatic data cleanup in the clipboard area. Select 'Permanent' for no automatic cleanup.
dataRetention.encryptStorageDescription: When enabled, clipboard entries will be stored encrypted in the database.

shortcuts.title: Shortcut Settings
shortcuts.addSelectedText: Add selected text to Clipboard Area
shortcuts.description: Select modifier and key combination to quickly add selected text to the clipboard area.
shortcuts.invalidWarning: Shortcut must include at least one modifier key and one character key.
shortcuts.restartNote: After modifying the shortcut, you need to click 'Apply Shortcut Changes' and restart the application for it to take effect.

notifications.appExists: Application "{appName}" is already in the whitelist
notifications.shortcutUpdated: Shortcut updated. Please restart the app to apply changes.
notifications.cleanupSuccess: Expired clipboard entries have been cleaned up.
notifications.cleanupFailed: Failed to clean up expired clipboard entries: {error}

notifications.providerOrModelMissing: Provider or model name is missing for the selected default AI model.
notifications.defaultModelSaveFailed: Failed to save default AI model: {error}
notifications.loadDefaultModelFailed: Failed to get default AI model: {error}
notifications.loadDefaultModelFromApiFailed: Failed to get default AI model from API, trying localStorage: {error}
notifications.apiKeyRequired: Please enter API key before testing
notifications.customModelParamsRequired: Please enter API endpoint and model identifier before testing
notifications.refreshStatsFailed: Failed to get AI usage statistics: {error}

settings.title: Update Settings
settings.autoCheckDescription: When enabled, the application will periodically check for new versions.

notifications.newVersionFoundNoSig: New version {version} found! (No signature verification mode)
notifications.alreadyUpToDate: You are already on the latest version!
notifications.alreadyUpToDateNoSig: You are already on the latest version! (No signature verification mode)

clipboardHistory.title: Clipboard Area
clipboardHistory.description: Manage your temporary notes here, merge them into formal notes or perform other actions.
clipboardHistory.copyToAutoAdd: Copy text to the clipboard to add it here automatically
clipboardHistory.confirmClearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all clipboard notes? This action cannot be undone.
clipboardHistory.defaultSummaryPrompt:
Please act as an information summary expert, adept at extracting key points from multiple independent text fragments and integrating them into a smooth, concise summary. I will provide you with a JSON formatted list of texts, each with a unique ID. Please read all text content carefully, then generate a summary of no more than 200 words, summarizing the common topics discussed or the core information expressed in these texts. Your response should be the summary content directly, without any additional explanation or pleasantries. Here is the list of texts you need to process:

```json
{placeholder}
```

notifications.invalidDays: Please enter a valid number of days
notifications.noNotesFound: No clipboard notes found in the last {days} days.

Could not detect a microphone device. Please ensure:
